name: Parque Ibirapuera
address: Av. Pedro Álvares Cabral, São Paulo - SP, 04094-050
description: One of the largest urban parks in Brazil, featuring museums, lakes, and jogging paths.

name: Museu de Arte de São Paulo (MASP)
address: Av. Paulista, 1578 - Bela Vista, São Paulo - SP, 01310-200
description: Iconic modern art museum with a suspended design and a vast collection of Western art.

name: Catedral da Sé
address: Praça da Sé - Sé, São Paulo - SP, 01001-000
description: A neo-Gothic cathedral located in the heart of São Paulo’s historic downtown.

name: Mercadão de São Paulo
address: R. Cantareira, 306 - Centro Histórico de São Paulo, São Paulo - SP, 01024-000
description: Famous public market known for exotic fruits, spices, and the iconic mortadella sandwich.

name: Avenida Paulista
description: São Paulo’s financial and cultural artery, filled with museums, shopping, and street performers.

name: Beco do Batman
address: R. Gonçalo Afonso - Vila Madalena, São Paulo - SP, 05436-100
description: An open-air gallery of graffiti and street art tucked into the bohemian Vila Madalena district.

name: Museu do Ipiranga
address: Parque da Independência, Ipiranga, São Paulo - SP, 04263-000
description: Historic museum near where Brazil declared independence, recently restored and reopened.

name: Edifício Martinelli
address: R. São Bento, 405 - Centro Histórico de São Paulo, São Paulo - SP, 01011-100
description: São Paulo’s first skyscraper, offering rooftop views of the city and rich architectural history.
